content.raw: I left a similar question on another pull request about keeping Ogre/Qt in the new API. I'm not sure how much trouble it would be to wrap some things in Gazebo types, something like `Ogre::RenderWindow` into `gazebo::rendering::RenderWindow`. Not even sure if it's worth the trouble or if the suggestion makes sense. I guess I'm just worried about having so many deprecations every new version.
